description: A sibling to the classic Cirque II Pant, the Cirque Lite brings a modern design and lighter weight fabric for spring-to-fall rock and alpine adventures, and year-round hiking. Updated for 2023 with a secure low-bulk waist with embedded adjustable belt and narrow cuffs with DuraPrint scuff guards for protection without added bulk.
name: Outdoor Research Cirque Lite Pants - Mens
